displayAddress: Old Parkbury Lane, Colney Street, AL2
detailedDescription: A 1/3 mile track leads to this characterful four bedroom family home set in a unique location on the boarders of both Radlett and St Albans. Perfect for equestrian facilities, or a growing family with its additional rooms within the converted stables. Springfield Farm is a detached characterful family home offering over 3,300 Sq ft of existing accommodation and outbuildings. Situated on a wonderful mature plot, the property offers outstanding country views as far as the eye can see. This is a wonderful opportunity to either move straight in, extend or completely re-develop (STPP). This substantial, four double bedroom home on a quiet, secluded plot of land is only a short drive to the desirable towns of St Albans and Radlett. Springfield Farm is situated on a south-facing plot of roughly 2 acres. There are three reception rooms on the ground floor as well as a WC. The sitting room, which is the heart of this home, is light and spacious with a feature fireplace and glass doors leading out to the terrace. Further reception rooms are currently utilised as a gym and a home office, catering to the family’s many lifestyles. The kitchen with a large utility room allows access to the integral garage and garden. From the entrance hall, a staircase leads to the first floor accommodation, with the principal bedroom boasting an en-suite bathroom with a large jacuzzi bath, and a spacious walk-in wardrobe. Three further double bedrooms, all of which have delightful views of the gardens and a large family bathroom, complete this floor. The plot itself offers an excellent degree of privacy, and access is granted via the imposing large gate to the house. The plot is laid to lawn with views over the woodlands beyond. The indoor swimming pool, housed in an outbuilding only a few feet away from the main house, currently is covered over and has been converted into a bar. The paved courtyard provides ample parking and leads to a double integral garage. Within the courtyard and adjacent to the house, the stables offer additional accommodation as a guest cottage with two further rooms ideal for a home office or further accommodation. Towards the entrance of the main property, located to the West of the home, is a manège with a single stable block. This is currently being used as an office area. Opportunity to renovate or completely re-develop (STPP) Semi-rural location Characterful four bedroom detached home with large driveway Surrounding land consisting of walkways, woods, streams Manège with additional stables Set in Approx. 2 acre plot Council Tax Band G Converted stables with self-contained accommodation and separate rooms used as offices Gated courtyard leading to a double garage

Nestled within the highly desirable gated Longdean Park, this impressive detached family home offers over 3,000 sq ft of versatile living space and presents fantastic potential for further expansion (subject to planning permission). Ideally located within easy reach of Abbot’s Hill School, a highly regarded independent school, recently named The Sunday Times Independent 11–16 School of the Year 2026. The property boasts two generous reception rooms, each bathed in natural light and offering wonderful views of the surrounding landscape— perfect spaces for relaxing and entertaining. The fitted kitchen is complemented by a separate utility room, providing practical convenience for family life. Upstairs, the principal bedroom features an en-suite shower room, while the family bathroom serves the remaining bedrooms. A study offers a quiet space for working from home, and the property also benefits from a double garage/workshop—ideal for additional storage, hobbies, or workspace. The home is set within beautifully landscaped grounds, creating a tranquil and private setting, while the ample parking further enhances practicality for family and guests alike. With its generous proportions, idyllic setting, and scope to extend, this property represents a rare opportunity to create a truly stunning family home in one of the area’s most prestigious locations. All that’s left is to arrange your viewing with Fine & Country.
